Frontend: Utilities & Config¶

Configuration and helper functions.

Config¶

src/config.API_URL¶
Type:

string

The base URL for the backend API.

  • Defaults to http://localhost:8000 if VITE_API_URL environment variable is not set.

export const API_URL = import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || 'http://localhost:8000';

Types¶

Common TypeScript interfaces used across the application.

class src/config.CameraInfo()¶

Represents a connected RealSense camera.

CameraInfo.camera_id¶
Type:

number

CameraInfo.type¶
Type:

string

CameraInfo.serial¶
Type:

string | null

CameraInfo.frame_size¶
Type:

[number, number]

CameraInfo.fps¶
Type:

number

class src/config.ProcessingJob()¶

Represents a YOLOv8 analysis task.

ProcessingJob.job_id¶
Type:

string

ProcessingJob.status¶
Type:

‘pending’ | ‘processing’ | ‘completed’ | ‘error’ | ‘cancelled’

ProcessingJob.camera1_progress¶
Type:

number

Progress percentage (0-100).
